inclusion.criterion: have a primary diagnosis of COPD
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: be admitted to the pulmonary ward due to an exacerbation in COPD
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: provide informed consent to participation in the study
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: be able to maintain an upright position on a chair
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: be able to be guided to training and understand instructions for participating
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: most patients suffering from a severe degree of COPD (GOLD III and IV)
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: unilateral resistance training of the quadriceps by the use of wrist weights is low cost, low technology
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has COPD exacerbation and meets inclusion criteria. However, patient's severe shortness of breath may be a concern for exclusion.
